resources.string: Hi there, we\'re excited you\'re here! UniverCity might feel a bit daunting right now, but we promise by the end you\'ll have some great memories...
To help hit the ground running, we\'ve put together a few useful resources...
Too many major options, not sure what to choose? Take our quiz to see what you might enjoy!
Based on your degree and major choices, we provide the list of subjects you have to complete
WeewoooWeewoo! Did someone call the WAMbulance? The WAM calculator feature will help you set and maintain your academic goals
Learn about the different major offerings UNSW provides
Throughout your degree, Mr. Corgi will be with you at the bottom right of the screen and will evolve as you progress to keep you motivated! Let\'s begin!
